Translations.Text: yaayyuha l-nabiyu harridi l-mu'minina ʿala l-qitali in yakun minkum ʿish'runa sabiruna yaghlibu mi-atayni wa-in yakun minkum mi-atun yaghlibu alfan mina alladhina kafaru bi-annahum qawmun la yafqahuna
al-ana khaffafa l-lahu ʿankum waʿalima anna fikum daʿfan fa-in yakun minkum mi-atun sabiratun yaghlibu mi-atayni wa-in yakun minkum alfun yaghlibu alfayni bi-idh'ni l-lahi wal-lahu maʿa l-sabirina
ma kana linabiyyin an yakuna lahu asra hatta yuth'khina fi l-ardi turiduna ʿarada l-dun'ya wal-lahu yuridu l-akhirata wal-lahu ʿazizun hakimun
lawla kitabun mina l-lahi sabaqa lamassakum fima akhadhtum ʿadhabun ʿazimun
fakulu mimma ghanim'tum halalan tayyiban wa-ittaqu l-laha inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
